#include<stdio.h>
#include<map>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main(){

    int n;
    string x;
    map<string,int> m;
    cin>>n;

    while(n--){
        cin>>x;
        m[x]++;
    }

    map<string,int>::iterator t=m.begin();

    while(t!=m.end()){
        cout<<t->first<<" "<<t->second<<"\n";
        t++;
    }

    return 0;
}
